name: Supercharge
display_help: Special. Recharge: Extremely Long

name: Flashover
display_help: Special. Recharge: Extremely Long

name: Short_Circuit
display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Charged_Brawl
display_help: Gremlin brawling attacks.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Tesla_Cage
display_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.

name: Havoc_Punch
display_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.

name: Thunderous_Blast
display_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

name: Gale
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Snow_Storm
display_help: The chill from this Snow Storm has dramatically Slowed your attack and movement speed.

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Lightning_Storm
display_help: The Hero can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Hero. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

name: Tesla_Cage
display_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.

name: Thunder_Clap
display_help: The Hero's Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Power_Thrust
display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Barrage
display_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Energy_Punch
display_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

name: Resistance
display_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

name: Laser_Beam_Eyes
display_help: You can emit Laser Beams from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can reduce the target's Defense. You must have Conserve Power or Focused Accuracy before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Unyielding
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF

name: Blaze
display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Flares
display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.

name: Fire_Sword
display_help: The Legacy of Flame can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: The Legacy of Flame breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

name: Combustion
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Fire_Smash
display_help: Fire punch attack

name: Scorch
display_help: The Hero's hands are engulfed in flames, igniting the target.

name: Fire_Sword
display_help: The Hero can summon a fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: The Hero breaths forth a cone of fire that burns all foes within it's narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range.

name: Fire_Shield
display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Resistance
display_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

name: Greater_Fire_Sword
display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to create an enhanced Sword of Fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Greater Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Combustion
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Incinerate
display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Fire_Sword_Slice
display_help: The Fire Sword has lowered your defense.

name: Fire_Sword_Circle
display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Healing_Flames
display_help: You can concentrate for a few moments and to dramatically heal himself with Healing Flames. The power of the flames can also protect you from Disorientation for a while.

name: Combustion
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Fire_Sword_Slice
display_help: The Fire Sword has lowered your defense.

name: Crush
display_help: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.

name: Lift
display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Propel
display_help: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

name: Transfusion
display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate

name: Siphon_Speed
display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your speed and reduced your damage potential to increase its own.

name: Crushing_Field
display_help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.

name: Singularity
display_help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Recharge: Very Long

name: Gravity_Distortion
display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering him unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

name: Fly
display_help: Heroes can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Bitter_Ice_Blast
display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Ice_Bolt
display_help: Your Attack and Movement rate has been slowed.

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: You have been frozen by an Ice Blast. Your movement Speed and Recharge rate are reduced.

name: Fire_Sword
display_help: A summoned fire sword that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks will also do a slight damage over time.

name: Frost_Breath
display_help: You are frozen by the Frost Breath. You are taking damage over time and your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

name: Combustion
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Force_Bolt
display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Phantom_Army
display_help: You can fabricate 2 to 4 Phantom heroes around a targeted foe. These Phantoms are not real, and are indestructible. Their attacks are similar to Spectral Wounds. Though they deal damage, it is illusory and will heal if the victim survives long enough. Phantoms are short lived and cannot be buffed or healed. Recharge: Very Long

name: Spectral_Terror
display_help: You can create an illusion of unspeakable Terror. The manifestation is so horrible that it caused most foes to tremble helplessly in terror. The Spectral Terror may also Terrify individual foes, causing them to run away in panic. Recharge: Slow

name: Phantasm
display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long

name: Protection_Shield
display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. Multiple Shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the shield can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic)

name: Detention_Field
display_help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid his allies. The target can, however, use powers on himself. Recharge: Slow

name: Dispersion_Bubble
display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow

name: Repulsion_Bomb
display_help: Projects an expanding Force Bubble around the caster that knocks down and Disorients nearby foes.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted Ally AoE), Foe Knockback, Disorient

name: Thunder_Kick
display_help: You are Disoriented

name: Storm_Kick
display_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

name: Shurikens
display_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

name: Cobra_Strike
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Focused_Fighting
display_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

name: Inner_Focus
display_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

name: Crane_Kick
display_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!

name: Exploding_Shuriken
display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dragons_Tail
display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

name: Quickness
display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

name: Elude
display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow

name: Eagles_Claw
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

name: Healing_Aura
display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

name: Fortitude
display_help: Heroes can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
display_short_help: Ally +DEF, +DMG, +ACC, +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception

name: Regeneration_Aura
display_help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long

name: Levitate
display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dominate
display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

name: Terrify
display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Mass_Hypnosis
display_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

name: Total_Domination
display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Mental_Training
display_help: The Fortunata Mistress is resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. They have improved Defense and Accuracy.

name: Drain
display_help: Untouchable

name: Teleport
display_help: Teleport

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Subdue
display_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

name: Will_Domination
display_help: Your will has been Dominated.

name: Scramble_Thoughts
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Psychic_Wail
display_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

name: Psychic_Wail
display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented.

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

name: Healing_Aura
display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

name: Subdue
display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Regeneration_Aura
display_help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long

name: Psionic_Tornado
display_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!

name: Scramble_Thoughts
display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving him dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Atomic_Blast
display_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.

name: Neutrino_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: X-Ray_Beam
display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Enervating__Field
display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.

name: Electron_Haze
display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Lingering_radiation
display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

name: Cosmic_Burst
display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Choking_Cloud
display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long

name: Neutron_Bomb
display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Dreadful_Wail
display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -Recovery

name: Shriek
display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target, weakening their damage resistance and slowing their movement speed.

name: Scream
display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while slowing their movement and weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Shockwave
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing and Energy damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Howl
display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Sonic_Siphon
display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow

name: Sonic_Barrier
display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. Multiple shields from the same hero cannot be stacked; however, the Sonic Barrier can be improved when another hero uses the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Screech
display_help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Liquefy
display_help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their Accuracy and Defense. Recharge: Slow

name: Barb_Swipe
display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

name: Lunge
display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

name: Spine_Burst
display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Regeneration
display_help: You recover Health and Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

name: Spine_Throwing
display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

name: Reconstruction
display_help: Heroes can concentrate for a few moments to heal themselves.

name: Impale
display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

name: Revive
display_help: Should a hero fall in battle, they can Revive themselves from the brink of death.

name: Quills
display_help: While this power is active, you will constantly fire dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines do minor damage, but can poison all foes in close range. Spine poison Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Ripper
display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

name: Jab
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Punch
display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

name: Resistance
display_help: Heroes are resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Haymaker
display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Unyielding
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF

name: Knockout_Blow
display_help: The Hero has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Heroes can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
